Published November 9 2014

Against Productivity

Against Productivity — This essay took four years for Quinn Norton to write, and you need to take twenty minutes to sit down and read it. I may not agree with all Ms. Norton’s conclusions, but this is the type of discourse that keeps our creativity alive.

Enjoy your day.
